category.Name: category
category.Description: Use "functional-mental-status", http://snomed.info/sct|384821006, and/or http://snomed.info/sct|118228005 to search for activities of daily living.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: The patient to search data for.
patient.Optional: Either patient or subject must be provided. If both are provided, they must reference the same patient.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The patient to search data for.
subject.Optional: Either patient or subject must be provided. If both are provided, they must reference the same patient.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

Observation.Name: Observation
Observation.Description: An instance of the R4 Observation resource.

category.Name: category
category.Description: Type of observation. Always includes SNOMED codes “118228005” and “384821006”, and custom code “functional-mental status.”

code.Name: code
code.Description: The type of observation. Values mapped. If no mapping exists, only the text value is returned.

effectivePeriod.Name: effectivePeriod
effectivePeriod.Description: Clinically relevant time period for the observation

note.Name: note
note.Description: Comments about the observation. A comment if flowsheet data or the associated note if inpatient goals. If using cascading flowsheets, the note element contains information about the additional flowsheet, if applicable, instead of the note. For example, a nurse documents flowsheet “daily activities” as abnormal, which opens flowsheet “mobility.” The nurse documents the value “highly mobile” in the flowsheet. The note element for “daily activities” is returned as “daily activities;highly mobile” if flowsheet “mobility” isn’t included in the Epic organization's configuration.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Who the observation is about. Reference to the patient resource.

valueCodeableConcept.Name: valueCodeableConcept
valueCodeableConcept.Description: Result of the observation. Values mapped. If not mapping exists, only the text value is returned.
